key_26: Because logs are an invaluable debugging resource, the following provides a backup process for obtaining application logs when Lantern is completely blocked, and in-app issue submission is not possible. These logs can be attached to
key_40: file and send in an email to support@getlantern.org

key_56: Select the user account that installed Lantern
key_59: button from the ribbon menu, hover over
key_68: Share this file in an email to support@lantern.io
